message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value.  I'm confident it can be a valuable asset for you. While I cannot disclose the specifics of the product at this time, I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000. This is a price I believe is fair given the potential value. Please consider this offer carefully. If you decline, I will be selling the product to another buyer for $1200000. Let me know your decision.
